/**
 * Created by czzou on 2016/12/16.
 */
// 请求url：http://tafnodejstest.wsd.com/getServerInfo
// 模拟大量请求
var http=require("http");

function sendReq(){
    http.get('http://tafnodejsrpc.wsd.com/getServerInfo', (res) => {
        console.log(`Got response: ${res.statusCode}`);
        // consume response body
        res.resume();
    }).on('error', (e) => {
        console.log(`Got error: ${e.message}`);
    });
}

setInterval(sendReq,500)
